attributes.action: Institute a national register of food hygiene offences and offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Offences such breaches of the trade marks act and similar offences are recorded on a national register.

Food hygiene offences are only recorded locally, so a person can cause food poisoning outbreaks in differnt areas without anyone being able to connect them with the problem and prevent problems happening in the first place
